mapper.select: select * from alarm_record where 1=1 order by create_time desc
select * from alarm_record inner join device on (alarm_record.device_id = device.device_id) order by create_time desc
select * from alarm_record inner join device on (alarm_record.device_id = device.device_id) where create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into alarm_record (alarm_id, device_id, reason, content, status, results, create_time) values (#{alarmId}, #{deviceId}, #{reason}, #{content}, #{status}, #{results}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update alarm_record set status=#{status},results=#{results} where alarm_id=#{alarmId}
